name: SoulPango
description:
She uses the kites, to reach the sky...

Every now and then, a few souls get lost, not reaching the sky, they need to go high but the risk too lost track, make some soul crack. She appears in place, young and happy, give the best, the path ahead so, the souls can rest, in a quieter place.

1 November all the souls that are stock in the earth has a chance to go up and rest. but some of them has trouble to reach the sky, you are a soul guide with one job, lead the way so they can finally rest in peace. every soul has his story, every soul has right to rest after they give their best.

Nixiq is a Soul guider who dies feeling lost, and when you find the way to past to the afterlife, she refuses because was so hard and difficult to her, that she decides to help other soul to reach the sky. 

- Throw Nixiq to the kites and guide a lost soul to the nearest place of rest.

- Purify the area so the soul can reach a proper rest

- Hand draw graphics and intuitive controls

* Android Cellphone.
